original_title: Fatal attack in Soysapura, Mt. Lavinia following heated argument
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A person was fatally attacked and killed in Soysapura, Mt. Lavinia. According to the police, the murder occurred after a heated argument with a relative escalated out of control. The deceased individual, a 68-year-old resident of Soysapura, lost their life in the incident. Police investigations are currently underway to apprehend the suspect involved in the attack.
